comment._content: books.google.com/books?id=YuPNAAAAMAAJ&lpg=PA86&o... collin minton&pg=PA86#v=onepage&q=henry collin minton&f=false indicates that in 1912, he was pastor of the First Presbyterian Church in Princeton, NJ. trentonhistory.org/Index/Index1918.html suggests that he resigned as pastor in January 1918. I have not found any indicatin why he was particularly in the news around 6/18/13 (date written on negative).
